title: Answer Product Comparison Question
description: A customer in the store is trying to decide between two different models of a coffee maker and asks an associate for help.

tasks.description: Identify the two products the customer is considering.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate knows which two items to compare.

tasks.description: Use a handheld device to bring up a side-by-side comparison of the two models' features.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays a comparison chart of the products.

tasks.description: Explain the key differences to the customer (e.g., 'This one has a built-in grinder, while the other one does not').
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate helps the customer make an informed decision.
